news.summary: In a bold move to close the gap with rivals, Grubhub is waiving delivery and service fees on restaurant orders over $50.

news.title: Notepad++ says Chinese government hackers hijacked its software updates for months
news.summary: The developer of the popular text editor Notepad++ said hackers associated with the Chinese government hijacked its software update mechanism to deliver tainted software to users for months.
